fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Budget, Trade, Competition, Customs, Enlargement, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action
organisation_name: Mitsubishi Hitachi Power Systems Europe GmbH (MHPSE)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
MHPSE, a subsidiary of globally operating MHPS Ltd., has over 100 years experience in designing and constructing power plants. Today it is also devising new energy storage technologies.  
Innovation, reliability and sustainability are its core drivers. 
Including subsidiaries, the company counts approx. 1,450 highly skilled staff. 
More information under www.eu.mhps.com.
